ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR((AND( Sub_Vendor_1__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_2__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_1__c == Sub_Vendor_2__c)), ( AND( Sub_Vendor_1__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_3__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_1__c == Sub_Vendor_3__c)), ( AND(Sub_Vendor_1__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_4__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_1__c == Sub_Vendor_4__c)), ( AND(Sub_Vendor_1__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_5__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_1__c == Sub_Vendor_5__c))), true , IF(OR((AND(Sub_Vendor_2__c != NULL,Sub_Vendor_3__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_2__c == Sub_Vendor_3__c)), (AND(Sub_Vendor_2__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_4__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_2__c == Sub_Vendor_4__c)),(AND( Sub_Vendor_2__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_5__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_2__c == Sub_Vendor_5__c))), true, IF(OR(( AND(Sub_Vendor_3__c != NULL,Sub_Vendor_4__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_3__c == Sub_Vendor_4__c)),( AND(Sub_Vendor_3__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_5__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_3__c == Sub_Vendor_5__c))), true, IF( OR((AND(Sub_Vendor_4__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_5__c != NULL, Sub_Vendor_4__c == Sub_Vendor_5__c))),true,false))))
